title: Σύνορα Αγάπης
overview: Nikiforos is a special forces soldier and has a relationship with Athena, a courageous journalist who does not hesitate to take risks in the service of the truth. In a car accident, her colleague, Dionysis, is killed, and Athena decides without hesitation to solve his death. Behind the case lies the illegal introduction of radioactive material to the slopes of Sfakia. Athena begins to "get" deeper and deeper into the case, which will lead to her kidnapping. Nikiforos will move heaven and earth to find her, only that the "importers" will send him Olga as bait, a young and beautiful scientist from Russia, who will lead Nikephoros to the great conflict between duty and love. What will ultimately prevail?
